author: Jason Fang, Erwin Renaldi And Samuel Yang
title: 'COVID-19-related racism is real': Here's what you can do if you're targeted
description: The Australian Human Rights Commission says about one in four people who lodged racial discrimination complaints in the past two months say they were targeted due to COVID-19.
content:

April 03, 2020 12:21:15
The Australian Human Rights Commission says about one in four people who lodged racial discrimination complaints in the past two months say they were targeted due to COVID-19.
